description: [LoFiSe](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1101) can monitor the file system to identify files less than 6.4 MB in size with file extensions including .doc, .docx, .xls, .xlsx, .ppt, .pptx, .pdf, .rtf, .tif, .odt, .ods, .odp, .eml, and .msg.(Citation: Kaspersky ToddyCat Check Logs October 2023)

external_references.description: Dedola, G. et al. (2023, October 12). ToddyCat: Keep calm and check logs. Retrieved January 3, 2024.
